    • securityCacheSize

      public GlobalSecurityConfigurationBuilder securityCacheSize(int securityCacheSize)
      Description copied from interface: GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder
      Defines the size for the access role cache. The default value is 1000.
      Specified by:
      securityCacheSize in interface GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder
      Parameters:
      securityCacheSize - the number of access roles to cache

    • securityCacheTimeout

      public GlobalSecurityConfigurationBuilder securityCacheTimeout(long securityCacheTimeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Description copied from interface: GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder
      Defines the timeout for which to cache user access roles. A value of -1 means the entries never expire. A value of 0 will disable the cache.
      Specified by:
      securityCacheTimeout in interface GlobalSecurityConfigurationChildBuilder
      Parameters:
      securityCacheTimeout - the timeout
      unit - the TimeUnit
